channel.title: Barrows mini on [pi]
channel.description:
Okay, i have 2 source im trying to pretty much put together and edit to make my own twist and i am normaly a delta person and this is my first [pi] project. There is like 3 things ima ask for help with in this thead.
How can i take away the tele to duel arena? im making a pking server but with duel arena on server no1 wants to go in wild and risk they all much rather go to duel arena which is glitched anyways. (i know how to removed teles on delta but not pi)
how can i put the barrows iteams back into the check and make to were you get a barrows piece like every 4 or 5 trips? i want like 20% chance of a barrows piece from chest. -1 of the sources im using has full barrows the way i want. an the other has same barrows mini but only thing you can get there is bolt racks cause there is a barrows shop at home. *im using the source that has barrows shop but i wanna remove barrows shop and put all pieces back in chest drop like the source i am taking parts outa has.
also i'd like to know how to make drops more and less rare.. i can do on delta but like i said im new to [pi] and just started this [pi] project today and i been very confused today ):
PLEASE HELP (:

item.title: Barrows mini on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @krunt krunt
item.description:
@krunt wrote:

It is okay im new for [pi] so you just trying to help gives me respect twards you ccause nobody else even posting

okay ice put barrows pieces bak in chest but idk how to delete that stupid barrows shop and it is ruining economy. ):

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows mini on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

no hmm look in player.java for barrow drops could be in there I am assuming it would be some sort of an int.

for the duel arena thing.

if (c.dialogueAction == 4) { c.getPA().startTeleport(3366, 3266, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("Dueling is at your own risk. Refunds will not be given for items lost due to glitches."); } if (c.dialogueAction == 20) { //c.getPA().startTeleport(3366, 3266, 0, "modern"); //c.killCount = 0;only other item i can find for it sorry. been a long time since I did teleports.

item.dc:creator: @krunt krunt
item.description:
@krunt wrote:

is npcdrops.tsm gonna help add rewards to barrows chest ? and that duel tele code you gave me is the 1 i deleted and i compiled and tele was still there.

item.title: Barrows mini on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

look for something like this

} else if (c.teleAction == 2) { //duel arena c.getPA().spellTeleport(3366, 3266, 0);

the npcdrops.tsm is used for a drop list for recorded npcs

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows mini on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @krunt krunt
item.description:
@krunt wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:394457”]6265:45 995:20000 808:129 886:127 391:2 207:2 3051:2 213:2

that is this

npcid:45%chanceofrarity tab itemid:amountofitem tab itemidPamountofitem
----ones placed on this line will be the rares.[/code][/quote]

so [code]6265:45	995:20000	808:129	886:127	391:2	207:2	3051:2	213:2

is the code to have the junk or the barrows iteams in the check? or is tthat just what i search to find chest in files?
oh and btw i went to clickingbuttons.java and searched ::mypos after teleporting to duelarena and i found its tele and i delete, then i found list of minigame teles that looked like this:
c.getDH().sendOption5(“Barrows”, “Pest Control”, “TzHaar Cave”, “Duel Arena”, “Warrior Guild”);
And i deleted:
“Duel Arena”,
and i compiled and thought duel arena tele was removed but when i logged on to check it was still there.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows mini on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

6265:45 995:20000 808:129 886:127 391:2 207:2 3051:2 213:2

that is this

npcid:45%chanceofrarity tab itemid:amountofitem tab itemidPamountofitem ----ones placed on this line will be the rares.

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows mini on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @krunt krunt
item.description:
@krunt wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:394457”]1. clickingbuttons.java
2.well I am assuming you know where the barrow items are at on the source cause you found what the chest has…

what you can do is just add more items to the chest really. make it so you can get some crap stuff.
3.npcdrops.tsm if you notice the #torm demon for example right below that it has a number like so

npcid:rarity itemid:amountofitem

only the first ratio is the npcid and rarity.[/quote]
Ight well no i havnt found chest iteams but im sure i can find if i just search bold racks since thats only thing it drops.
so tell me if i got this right npcid: iteam i want in it : change of getting?
and like i said i got i got a [pi]source with full barrows mini but im not using that source anymore… is there a way i can search up somthing and just move the whole barrows mini to the new source i am using?

Ifound baeeows minigame file before you replied but chest rewards wasnt in there so ima do what you said and try clickingbuttons.java

Read full topic

    2.well I am assuming you know where the barrow items are at on the source cause you found what the chest has…

what you can do is just add more items to the chest really. make it so you can get some crap stuff.
3.npcdrops.tsm if you notice the #torm demon for example right below that it has a number like so

npcid:rarity itemid:amountofitem

only the first ratio is the npcid and rarity.
